name: Break a Leg (itch) (Walker_P) (Walker_P)
description:
In this short puzzle-platformer, you’ll be able to explosively fire your limbs away in order to double - even triple jump! Sacrifice your limbs to solve the puzzles.

Controls: WASD to move & Space to jump/double-jump/triple-jump (once you unlock them).

Level Skipping: By default, level skipping is turned on (toggle in the options menu). Press ‘N’ to go to the next level or ‘B’ to go back to the previous level. This is so Ludum Dare raters can see all of the features/content of the game even if they get stuck on a level (some of them are a bit difficult :D)
